ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Flank steak benefits from being sliced thinly against the grain after cooking
The two soups create a rich, complex sauce that clings well to the meat
Let the steak rest 5 minutes before slicing for maximum tenderness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How should I slice flank steak to maximize tenderness when serving this simple slow cooker dish?
